pullRequest.title: ENT-3109: Create Jenkins job for translation extraction
pullRequest.bodyText:
(gettext/msgattrib)

Added a Gradle task to perform msgattrib on po files.

nodes.bodyText: Even though this is the description of what msgattrib is doing in general, we're using msgattrib in a very specific way here, so let's change this description to reflect that. Something like Use msgattrib to remove obsolete strings (that were already removed from the source code & template file) from translation files.  should be good
